name: Nctu-vexch-plus
tagline: The better interface for NCTU virtial exchange
body:
### Download
The newest is available at [Github release page](https://github.com/iblis17/nctu-vexch-plus/releases)

### Feature
* 更漂亮的 User Interface
* 可拖曳的資訊框
* 目前下單功能僅支援 股市、期貨
* 更好用下單表格
 * 自訂價格區間
 * 抓取市價按鈕

### TODO
* 自帶的自選股報價
 * 虛擬交易所的自選股報價居然有數量限制
* Chrome extension options page
* Resizable div

### Get Involved
* Contribution welcomed!
* 有任何想法或是踩到 bug 歡迎到 [issue list](https://github.com/iblis17/nctu-vexch-plus/issues) 討論
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
